name: A Bad Day To Be a Hero
name_original: A Bad Day To Be a Hero
description:
Play as the villains in this reverse-dungeon crawler and stop the heroes from stealing back your hard-earned treasure!

Controls:

WASD - Move

MOUSE/SPACE - Aim/Attack

UP/DOWN ARROW - Zoom In/Out

LEFT CLICK - Possess The Minion Closest to Your Mouse!

E - Possess the Minion Closest to You!

CLICK THE SHOP ICON IN THE TOP RIGHT TO ACCESS THE STORE!

Instructions:

Defend the castle from increasingly strong waves of heroes!

Attack heroes to defeat them and earn bones. You can spend bones in the shop to buy minions.

Minions support you automatically, but you can also play as them! 

The minions have distinct characteristics that may help you defeat your enemies...

MADE & DESIGNED BY:

Justin, Jared, Hongqian, Jiezhong, Sammy, Jonathan D., Jonathan L., Nicholas, Hayson, Henry, Tanner, David, and Eugen
